definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: At sur-rhone, north Durance River and the confluence rhone 4 kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 在罗讷河畔，南距迪朗斯河和罗讷河汇合处4公里。

sentences.english: We linked up with the other group on the hilltop.
sentences.chinese: 我们在山顶和另一个小组汇合。

sentences.english: Commando force joined up with the airborne troops near the captured bridge.
sentences.chinese: 突击队和空降部队在被占领的桥梁附近汇合。

sentences.english: A confluent small-pox had in all directions flowed over his face .
sentences.chinese: 天花打四面八方汇合拢来，布满了他整个脸孔。

sentences.english: These in descending order of similar data element set is called array.
sentences.chinese: 这些顺次摆列地同类数据元素地汇合称为数组。

sentences.english: On this tumultuous descent, streams merge and tributaries unite.
sentences.chinese: 喧嚣下，百川并纳，支流汇合。

sentences.english: The Grand Canal joins the Haihe at Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 大运河在天津与海河汇合。

sentences.english: In complete darkness, I joined a couple of crew members at the back of the boat.
sentences.chinese: 天完全黑下来后，我来到船尾和几名船员汇合。

sentences.english: A stream is winding its way through the valley into the river.
sentences.chinese: 一弯溪水蜿蜒流过山谷，汇合到江里去了。

sentences.english: A stream was winding its way through the valley into the river.
sentences.chinese: 一弯溪水蜿蜓流过山谷，汇合到江里去了。

sentences.english: Summer is also possible to enter from the West, then East and West converge in the Central Plains Xia and Shang.
sentences.chinese: 也有可能夏从西部进入，后来夏商东西汇合于中原。

sentences.english: Their company stands where Renming Road and Hongxing Road meet.
sentences.chinese: 他们的公司坐落在人民路和红星路汇合处。

sentences.english: Contrarily, there isn't clearconfluence area in drought years;
sentences.chinese: 旱年则没有显著的汇合区。

sentences.english: Wuhan lies here the Yangtze and the Han River meet.
sentences.chinese: 武汉位于长江和汉水汇合处。

sentences.english: Ane they tumble from this higher land to meet the Ganges on the plains.
sentences.chinese: 支流从高地往下流，与平原上的恒河汇合。

definition: to meet/to rendezvous/to merge/to link up/meeting/confluence
to go on a journey/to leave
to set out (of troops)/departure/start date (of military expedition)
to stop/to obstruct/to bar the way
to set out on a journey
to collaborate/to join forces/to effect a junction
(of troops) to depart for/to head for
to return/to go back/to come back
